cancellationPolicies.label: Deposit Only rates
cancellationPolicies.description: This property has a 1 day cancellation policy. Failure to cancel within this time will result in a cancellation charge equal to the first night of your stay, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information).

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Female Dorm Ensuite
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: One bed in a dorm with three bunks, totalling six females. Each room has two private bathrooms, locker, and a fan/heater. Guests are provided with linen and dishes. Towels can be rented at an additional cost. You'll also have access to all common areas.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

rateRuleViolationsMessages.description: Requires a minimum of 4 nights stay on your dates

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Each twin room is fitted with a bunk bed including linen, towels, soap, mini-fridge, kettle, tea and coffee. Some are equipped with a microwave / kitchenette and air con. This can be requested but not guaranteed. If not, all rooms have a fan/heater.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only

specialEventConditions.title: Xmas New Year 2025/26
specialEventConditions.description: All bookings from 16th December to 5th of January are non-refundable and paid in full upon reservation.

freeCancellation.label: Free Cancellation rates
freeCancellation.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 15th Dec 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 15th Dec 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.
